mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Estate of Hugh Adams
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This document records payment by Robert Hutcheson, Executor of Hugh Adams, from the estate to W. McLain, Fin. Sec. A. C. S. (American Colonization Society). The funds were used for passage to and six months support in Liberia for several slaves. The amount is $980 in total which covers $70 each for some and $35 each for others.
The available file is a PDF made from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Receipt for R. Hutcheson from W. McLain, April 19, 1860
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Legacies
Slavery
Slaves -- Emancipation
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
